This has been happening to me almost every night before I go to bed since Iâ€™ve been a kid. I would always try to explain it to people what my body and I were going through before bed but no one could understand it.

Beautiful sensations all over my body. A feeling of home, warmth, and as if Iâ€™m literally everything; a glowing embodiment feeling. I am the thing I am staring at, I am the thing behind the thing staring at the thing. I am everything.

I canâ€™t explain it as well as you guys can.
